event.title: SIEM (Security Information and Event Management)Online Training Free Demo - Intellipaat
event.description:
Intellipaat is organizing a free demo for SIEM Training online. The demo is for the SIEM Training . Which Specialises in training SIEM courses Splunk tool for working with machine-generated data, master Splunk architecture, Syslog Server, log analysis, searching, analyzing and monitoring of data, As part of this course, you will be mastering Splunk searches, alerts, commands, events, lookups, parsing and a lot more.

What will you learn in this Splunk SIEM Training?

Core concepts of Splunk
Search applications
Splunk Cloud and log management
Splunk enterprise security
Performing searching and visualization in Splunk
Data Analytics and formatting through Splunk
Data enriching, Splunk monitoring, and lookups
Creating Splunk reports and charts

Who can join the Splunk SIEM Training Demo event?
Software Developers and System Administrators
Analytics Managers who wish to derive agile insights from data
Beginners who aspire to get trained in Splunk software and analyze machine-generated data

What should you know before joining this event?

Before joining the event, you should know the basics of Splunk.
Here are few free resources
Splunk Tutorial
Splunk Interview Questions
